headline: Essential Security Checks for Modern Apps

digest_items.title: Use security linters in CI/CD
digest_items.why: Automated security checks catch vulnerabilities before deployment
digest_items.fix: Integrate tools like Bandit (Python), ESLint security plugin (JS)

digest_items.title: Use parameterized queries
digest_items.why: Parameterized queries prevent SQL injection attacks
digest_items.fix: Never concatenate user input into SQL; use prepared statements instead

digest_items.title: Scan for exposed .git directories
digest_items.why: Exposed .git folders can leak source code and sensitive configuration
digest_items.fix: Block access in web server config or use .htaccess: 'RedirectMatch 404 /\.git'

digest_items.title: Implement rate limiting on APIs
digest_items.why: Rate limits prevent brute force attacks and API abuse
digest_items.fix: Use middleware like express-rate-limit or nginx limit_req module

digest_items.title: Implement input validation
digest_items.why: Unvalidated input leads to injection attacks and data corruption
digest_items.fix: Validate all user input on both client and server side
